doc.title: Jaya
doc.plot: Balaji, Kannan, Michael and Salim are four friends who have faced several disappointments and now have different ambitions to succeed in life. They came across Jaya, who encourages them to stand on their own legs in order to succeed. But Jaya has her own sad past. She lost her best friend in college Priya, due to the machinations of three bigwigs in society. So, Ramya sets out to track and destroy the man who is responsible.
